overview.overview: Mailu is a simple yet full-featured mail server, it is free software, open to suggestions and external contributions.  support IMAP and IMAP+, SMTP

childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Standard email server, IMAP and IMAP+, SMTP and Submission with autoconfiguration profiles for clients
  • Advanced email features, aliases, domain aliases, custom routing
  • Web access, multiple Webmails and administration interface
  • User features, aliases, auto-reply, auto-forward, fetched accounts, managesieve
  • Admin features, global admins, announcements, per-domain delegation, quotas
  • Security, enforced TLS, DANE, MTA-STS, Letsencrypt!, outgoing DKIM, anti-virus scanner, Snuffleupagus, block malicious attachments
  • Antispam, auto-learn, greylisting, DMARC and SPF, anti-spoofing
  • Freedom, all FOSS components, no tracker included
